00002 #define JSON_SPIRIT_READ_STREAM

00012 
00013 #include "json_spirit/json_spirit_reader_template.h"
00014 
00015 namespace json_spirit
00016 {
00017     // these classes allows you to read multiple top level contiguous values from a stream,
00018     // the normal stream read functions have a bug that prevent multiple top level values 
00019     // from being read unless they are separated by spaces
00020 
00021     template< class Istream_type, class Value_type >
00022     class Stream_reader
00023     {
00024     public:
00025 
00026         Stream_reader( Istream_type& is )
00027         :   iters_( is )
00028         {
00029         }
00030 
00031         bool read_next( Value_type& value )
00032         {
00033             return read_range( iters_.begin_, iters_.end_, value );
00034         }
00035 
00036     private:
00037 
00038         typedef Multi_pass_iters< Istream_type > Mp_iters;
00039 
00040         Mp_iters iters_;
00041     };
00042 
00043     template< class Istream_type, class Value_type >
00044     class Stream_reader_thrower
00045     {
00046     public:
00047 
00048         Stream_reader_thrower( Istream_type& is )
00049         :   iters_( is )
00050         ,    posn_begin_( iters_.begin_, iters_.end_ )
00051         ,    posn_end_( iters_.end_, iters_.end_ )
00052         {
00053         }
00054 
00055         void read_next( Value_type& value )
00056         {
00057             posn_begin_ = read_range_or_throw( posn_begin_, posn_end_, value );
00058         }
00059 
00060     private:
00061 
00062         typedef Multi_pass_iters< Istream_type > Mp_iters;
00063         typedef spirit_namespace::position_iterator< typename Mp_iters::Mp_iter > Posn_iter_t;
00064 
00065         Mp_iters iters_;
00066         Posn_iter_t posn_begin_, posn_end_;
00067     };
00068 }
00069 
00070 #endif
